title: It's shit like this that honestly makes me wonder if Trump's actually wanting to be President
body:
Or wanting Hilary to be plus using this as publicity for his new TV network and all.

https://www.facebook.com/OccupyDemocrats/videos/1284729201620131/

This isnt even the only one. There's multiple videos of him in the past saying Bill Clinton was an amazing President and that Hilary was an amazing Senator by far. He's said it repeatedly. 

I swear to god the dude's just memeing everyone at this point.

I mean come on. You have a guy who
-Has openly supported Hilary and Bill in the past

##-Has said, legitimately, on camera, he identifies more as a Democrat and thinks Republicans time and time again have ruined things

##(Source: Video: http://www.cnn.com/2015/07/21/politics/donald-trump-election-democrat/ )

-Will build a wall of memes
-Targets a particular religion (Islam)
-Targets a particular ethnicity (Hispanics)
-"Global warming was created by and for the Chinese"
-Anti-vaxer; "Vaccines cause autism"

I mean. Come on. This whole thing has to be a fucking joke.
